org.webcurator.domain.model.core
Class Target

java.lang.Object
  org.webcurator.domain.model.core.AbstractIdentityObject
      org.webcurator.domain.model.core.AbstractTarget
          org.webcurator.domain.model.core.Target
All Implemented Interfaces:
InTrayResource, UserInTrayResource, Annotatable, HasDatabaseIdentity, HasIdentity, HasOid, Overrideable, UserOwnable
public class Target
extends AbstractTarget

A Target is a set of seeds, schedules and profile overrides that specify what to harvest, at what times, and what harvest profile to use.

Author:
nwaight

isApprovable

public boolean isApprovable()
Checks if the target can be approved. A target can be approved so long as:
  • There is at least one seed
  • Every seed is attached to at least one permission;
  • No seed is attached to a denied permission;

Returns:
true if the target can be approved; otherwise false.
